scripts.build-deps: browserify -t babelify  -r bluebird -r lodash -r react/addons | uglifyjs -c >  build/eli-externdeps.bundle.min.js
scripts.watch-module-common: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/components/module-common.js:module-common -r -o build/eli-common.module.js -d
scripts.watch-module-assessment: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/components/module-assessment-common.js:module-assessment-common -r -o build/eli-assessment-common.module.js -d -v
scripts.watch-module-math: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x lodash -x ./src/components/module-math-elem.js:module-math-elem -r -o build/eli-math-elem.module.js -d -v
scripts.watch-core: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x bluebird -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/bundle-core.js:core -r -o build/eli-core.bundle.js -d -v
scripts.watch-player: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x bluebird -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/bundle-player.js:player -r -o build/eli-player.bundle.js -d -v
scripts.watch-inter: watchify   -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -x bluebird -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/bundle-interactives.js:interactives -r -o build/eli-interactives.bundle.js -d -v
